The First Amendment to the US constitution is part of the country's landmark Bill of Rights, from 1791. Among the declarations, it guarantees that the government will not "abridge" the freedom of speech in law.

That guarantee is between the government and the people - and does not usually involve private companies.

搞清楚條law 先
條law 原意係保護公眾有接觸言論自由既權利

youtube channel 係private company 既service, 佢無禁止公眾有言論自由，因為公眾仍然可以係任何地方享受言論自由

只不過公眾係youtube channel 無言論自由既話，咁只係你有無接受佢既服務條款


不過我自己ethically 就唔認同youtube 應該要限制言論自由

court判佢冇違法
唯有用輿論令佢低頭

quote.msg:
The First Amendment to the US constitution is part of the country's landmark Bill of Rights, from 1791. Among the declarations, it guarantees that the government will not "abridge" the freedom of speech in law.

That guarantee is between the government and the people - and does not usually involve private companies.

條law 原意係保護公眾有接觸言論自由既權利

youtube channel 係private company 既service, 佢無禁止公眾有言論自由，因為公眾仍然可以係任何地方享受言論自由

只不過公眾係youtube channel 無言論自由既話，咁只係你有無接受佢既服務條款


不過我自己ethically 就唔認同youtube 應該要限制言論自由
